name: 9to5 Mac
description: A simpler and easier to read experience for the 9to5mac website.
additional_info:
This style in no way tries to minimize the work being done by the staff of 9to5mac.com. On the contrary, it makes it easier to keep frequenting the site because it is a great place to see the news.
